testName: Demonstrates front-running attack mitigation on transferWithPermit
additionalNotes: Front-running attack demonstrated: Attacker called permit() first (tx: 0xe96f49f51cf862b2caa7584a668cda5d6e023a693f7f58acb826e66b01bff2a6), consuming nonce 4. With mitigation: transferWithPermit() succeeded (tx: 0x068185a4cb09a8bd638f6dfef765157de91b0b3037150a627c5ab7924c78611c) because permit() failed but allowance was already set by attacker. Transfer completed successfully: 100 tokens transferred from owner to recipient.
